attributes.action: Stop poles erection 28 days notice without consultation AONB,  BROADWAY.
attributes.additional_details: cables installed below ground (not telegraph poles) AREA OF OUTSTANDING NATURAL BEAUTY
attributes.background: stop Full Fibre Ltd. WiFi Telegraph Poles erected Broadway Worcestershire.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Exclude telecommunication installations from permitted development legislation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635960
